examples: I heard a bird singing in the tree.
She loves watching birds at the park.
He has a pet parrot that he trained to talk.
Eu ouvi um pássaro cantando na árvore.
Ela adora observar pássaros no parque.
Ele tem um papagaio de estimação que treinou para falar.

suggested: Why do birds fly south for the winter? Because it's too far to walk!
The sound of a bird singing can bring up feelings of nostalgia or longing for something lost.
Birds can be a source of frustration for farmers or gardeners, who may have to deal with them eating crops.
Did you know that birds are the only animals that have feathers?
There's no specific smell associated with 'bird', but the scent of something that reminds you of a particular memory or experience can be connected to birds.
There's no physical sensation associated with 'bird', but the feeling of watching a bird take flight can be awe-inspiring.
Birds can be connected to the ideas of freedom, flight, and nature, as well as specific cultural or mythological beliefs.
